short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the For You tab on X

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you hate the 'For You' feed that X defaults you to? 
Yeah, me too, so install this extension to remove it and escape it's algorithmic horror!
You're welcome.

Note** This doesn't access or edit your data in anyway, but simply removes the For You content and tab button.
